original_text: The king of Moab at that time was Balak, the son of Zippor. He had seen what the Israelites did to the Amorites.
korean_text: 십볼의 아들 발락이 이스라엘이 아모리인에게 행한 모든 일을 보았으므로

sentences.original_text: The king of Moab at that time
was Balak, the son of Zippor
what the Israelites did to the Amorites
sentences.korean_translation: 이스라엘 사람들이 아모리 사람들에게 한 일을
